USER PERSONA: DESIGN AGENCY - UNITED STATES

Table 01: DEMOGRAPHICS

| Data points | Answers |
| --- | --- |
| Name | Jordan Smith |
| Age | 32 |
| Occupation | Marketing Manager |
| Annual income | $85,000 |
| Marital status | Married |
| Family situation | One child (age 5) |
| Location | New York City, NY |

Table 02: USER DESCRIPTION

Jordan is a 32-year-old marketing manager from New York City, NY. She is married with one child and earns an annual income of $85,000.

Table 03: PSYCHOGRAPHICS

| Data points | Answers |
| --- | --- |
| Personal characteristics | Detail-oriented, creative, ambitious, organized, collaborative |
| Hobbies | Yoga, cooking, hiking |
| Interests | Art and design, technology, social media |
| Personal aspirations | To become a creative director and launch her own marketing agency |
| Professional goals | To develop successful marketing campaigns and improve her design skills |
| Pains | Tight deadlines, unresponsive clients, lack of creative inspiration |
| Main challenges | Balancing work and family life, managing stress |
| Needs | Access to high-quality design resources and professional development opportunities |
| Dreams | To travel the world and work on creative projects that inspire her and make a difference. |

Table 04: SHOPPING BEHAVIORS

| Data points | Answers |
| --- | --- |
| Budget | $5,000 - $10,000 per project |
| Shopping frequency | Quarterly or as needed |
| Preferred channels | Online (Google, social media, design blogs), referrals from colleagues and industry connections |
| Online behavior | Conducts research, reads reviews, compares prices, and looks at portfolios |
| Search terms | "Top design agencies," "creative marketing firms," "design and branding services" |
| Preferred brands | Companies with a proven track record of producing high-quality designs and innovative work |
| Triggers | Recommendations from colleagues or friends, impressive portfolios, clear pricing and services |
| Barriers | Unclear or high pricing, lack of transparency in the design process, lack of industry expertise. |

Solutions to the pain points:

* Tight deadlines: We offer fast turnaround times for projects and have an efficient design process to ensure timely delivery.
* Unresponsive clients: We have a clear communication process and keep our clients informed throughout the design process.
* Lack of creative inspiration: Our team of experienced designers can provide creative and innovative solutions for any design project.
* Balancing work and family life: We offer flexible meeting times and can work around your schedule to ensure a smooth and stress-free design process.
* Managing stress: Our team can handle all aspects of the design process, allowing you to focus on other aspects of your job and life.

Cold email template:

Subject: Creative design solutions for your marketing campaigns

Dear Jordan,

We came across your profile and noticed that you are a marketing manager who values creativity and innovative design solutions. Our design agency specializes in providing high-quality design resources and professional development opportunities to help businesses like yours achieve their marketing goals.

We understand that managing tight deadlines and unresponsive clients can be a challenge, and finding creative inspiration can be difficult at times. That's why we offer a range of services to help you overcome these obstacles and take your marketing campaigns to the next level.
